summary:
I believe in you.
I know that you want to make a positive change in the world, create a more Sustainable planet, solve the climate crisis and help your team to be totally engaged and passionate about Sustainable projects.

Also, I know that you want to work in a way that is also sustainable for you, having passion and meaning in what you do.

It seems a tall order but with the right system it can be more easily attained.

First, you need to start with yourself. Your work must be sustainable. When you do that which you love and you are passionate about, you have more energy and get less tired. You can do the work for longer or work the same hours with less stress.

When you know what is more meaningful for you and how to tap into your personal purpose, then you can more easily motivate your team to express their passion and purpose.

And only then, when you team is on fire and super clear about your common and inspiring Purpose, you can change the world, engaging with perfect customers that love and appreciate what you do.

I help you to make that happen with the following services:

PERSONAL TRANSFORMATION:
I start with you as a leader.
The Sustainability Transformation journey starts with you.
I help you to Discover your 5 Top Passions and in a structured way find their scores and KPIs for those passions using a Method to move the needle.
I use "The Passion Test" a Method for which I am a Certified Facilitator.
You transform one step at a time, and you get ready to transform your organization.
You get clear, organized, crush your limiting beliefs, and elevate your personal energy and confidence to the stratosphere.
You even get in physical shape. You will need every ounce of energy to lead this change!

COMPANY TRANSFORMATION:
Once you are ready, I help you to transform your organization by anchoring it in a common energizing purpose and unleashing the passion of your team members.

WORLD TRANSFORMATION: MAKE A POSITIVE IMPACT
I help you also to give your company more visibility in order to attract your perfect customers so you can create a positive impact.

DM me for a Free Discovery Session if you are interested in Sustainability Transformation:

profile_positions.location: In person in the Netherlands and Online for the rest of the world.
profile_positions.description:
By using a 3 steps Method for Transformation: (Transform yourself, Transform your organization, and  Transform the world), I start with the foundation of any behavior or business results: your Mindset.
Once your Mindset is transformed, your identity upgraded, your limiting beliefs reframed, your passion ignited, and your Purpose clear, you can lead your team towards the results that you want to achieve.

After working with the leader/s I go to Step 2 working with the Team, aligning them with the clarity of the Organizational Purpose and igniting their Passion, so they can work connected with what is most meaningful for them. That will increase their productivity and well-being.

The third step focuses on attracting and retaining perfect-fit customers for the organization. That is of course the key to a successful business and I make sure that the sales teams develop the mindsets, habits and best practices to go from "sales at any costs" to selling to perfect-fit customers.

Below I describe the different Services I provide.
They can be implemented in a complete Program or as independent Modules.
profile_positions.title: Founder

profile_positions.location: Step 1: Activate the Leader/s Passion and Purpose
profile_positions.description:
The journey of Transformation starts with you.

As a leader, you want to transform your organization and transform the world: to make it a more sustainable place, a more passionate place. You want to create a positive impact.

By using a structured Executive Coaching Method called "The Passion Test" for which I am a Certified Facilitator, I help you/the company's leaders to connect with your inner passion by Discovering your 5 Top Work & Business Passions. 

When you Unleash these Passions you become more motivated, on fire, and from there you can take the necessary actions to execute your business strategy.

Every day we make thousands of decisions: when you are clear and motivated, you have more agility in the decision-making process. That reduces your stress and increases your success, because you will be making decision faster, and more aligned with the clarity of your most meaningful business goals.
profile_positions.title: Executive Coaching: Everything starts by clarifying your Purpose and Igniting your Passion.💚

profile_positions.location: Step 2: Unify your Team's Purpose and create Employee Engagement
profile_positions.description:
Your Company's Purpose is the most powerful tool for attracting customers and engaging with them at the C-level or at the level that you want to work with them.

Also, for the organization to work in alignment, everyone needs to be clear of the Purpose, so there is no conflict in the directions that people want to go when making business decisions.

Working with Purpose is also contrary to working with ego. It has been demonstrated that when people work connected with a purpose bigger than themselves, they work better in teams and they connect with more ease with clients with a similar purpose. Working with ego definitely makes things more difficult at all levels, including wellbeing, because increases cortisol levels and inflammation, which is the precursor of disease.

I will help you to surface your Implicit Purpose, declare your Aspirational Purpose, and Create an Inspirational Purpose that will ignite your team and your clients.

With "The Passion Test for Business" Method, I will also help you as a company, department, or group to find the Top 5 Business Passions that are most meaningful for the whole team, in a consensual manner, so everyone is aligned with your 5 Business Passion Statements.

Using a specific questioning technique, I facilitate that everyone gets on the same page.

You will walk out with the Top 5 Business Themes/Passions/Core Values that everyone agrees with, so it will be much easier to make decisions day by day.

Also, this Method provides you with "Scores", "Markers" and an Action Plan, so you can identify if you are on the right track to creating the results and impact that you want to create.
profile_positions.title: Organization Coaching: Get Clear on your energizing Purpose & Unleash your Team's Passions❤️

profile_positions.location: Step 3: Use the "Perfect Customer" program to create effortless results
profile_positions.description:
Eventually, the key to any business's success is to attract and retain clients.

But not just any clients.

You want to sell your products and services to Perfect Customers/Early adopters, reducing your sales cycle and creating long term relationships and raving fans

In order for your business to be successful in a sustainable manner, you need to align with clients that appreciate your products and services, pay on time, don't demand unreasonable time and service beyond your contracts, give you references and testimonials and use your products enough to become brand ambassadors.

The times to sell at any cost and ignore the consequences of selling to customers that are not a perfect fit for your organization are long gone. We all know what is the result of those types of practices: short-term revenue and long-term problems that cripple the business.

I facilitate the habits and best practices to attract, align, sell and retain perfect-fit customers, so the whole sales team and everyone bringing customers to the organization is aware that you are working now with a new paradigm.
profile_positions.title: Customer Engagement: Gain visibility and Align with/Attract your Perfect Customers & Stakeholders🌎

profile_positions.description:
I introduced the concept of "Sustainability Leadership" for this Australian's company environmental monitoring Software, which brought a whole different conversation with prospects, so I was able to interact with the CEOs, Directors, and VPs of Sustainability from ports and industrial Companies.

I also applied the concept of "Perfect Customer" in my business development interactions in order to identify those prospects who were aligned with our values and commitments.

In that way, I was able to bring this Australian Company to their first big industrial client In Europe.

The software technology we were selling was created in service of Sustainability and a better quality of life for people in cities, reducing the impact on air quality from industrial sites.

By being able to speak the language of the decision-makers, with the concept of Sustainability Leadership and the one of "social license to operate", I was able to connect the use of the software with our prospects' business needs.
profile_positions.title: Bringing Sustainability Leadership to Ports & Industrial Cies. | Environmental Monitoring Software

profile_positions.description:
In this assignment, I was calling on my former work colleagues from Invensys (a previous employer) and creating an attractive business proposition for them with a new Industrial Automation Software, so they would take me along to the most precious clients that they've nurtured for years.

So my former colleagues became my new business partners and essentially my customers, as their clients would pay them and we will invoice Invensys.

That was tricky, to say the least, but many of them did, and we did business together, presenting a stronger value proposition to their customers than they had by themselves.

The magic of relationships and great technology, all over again.

I got to visit the spectacular line of refineries and petrochemical companies near the port of Rotterdam which was impressive (if you are impressed by that sort of thing) and do business with people that I admired and respected.
profile_positions.title: Creating Resilient Alliances with the European's subsidiaries of a Big Industrial Automation Company

profile_positions.location: Creating synergies within Invensys worldwide for Energy Efficiency Solutions
profile_positions.description:
I was in the middle of the creation of Invensys Operations Management (IOM), a new organization based on the synergistic integration of Eurotherm, Invensys Process Systems (IPS), Wonderware, and IMServ.

The idea was that the new organization would leverage the competencies of 4 sister companies, bringing to the market a very powerful combination of consulting, hardware, and software to solve the business needs of industrial enterprises worldwide.

In this role, I focused on helping Industrial Companies in achieving Energy Efficiency in their operations.

I helped Invensys with the Marketing of a unified solution for Energy Efficiency, by combining disparate products and services scattered around the world.

Invensys Operations Management (IOM) had Software Simulators, powerful Solutions for Energy Efficiency, SCADA Systems that could control processes and decrease energy consumption, Consulting, and much more.

I see this role (in hindsight) as a combination of Marketing Strategy and Business Development. First I had to "create" the products and services, as a combination of existing capabilities in the organization.

Then, I had to sell them, which I did to worldwide energy and industrial companies.

It was an amazing role in which I learned enormously about Sustainability and Energy Efficiency in the industrial sector, knowledge that I use now in my Sustainability Leadership Programs.
profile_positions.title: Creating Synergies across a global organization in the Energy Efficiency and Energy Management space

profile_positions.location: Based in Madrid, working with global customers (Shanghai, Germany, California)
profile_positions.description:
This role was a radical departure from my previous jobs in the oil industry and the beginning of falling in love with renewable energy and sustainability.

I came in contact with amazing colleagues, that were experts in Climate Change and Sustainability and I had to do research on Renewable Energy and how to integrate Eurotherm's industrial automation technology into the wind and solar energy space.

This was a global role, that required to be in contact with international teams from the US, UK, Spain,
Germany, France, China, and India as the main ones. I managed a pipeline of global opportunities in these countries.
profile_positions.title: Connecting Industrial Automation Company to global Renewable Energy customers in Wind & Solar Enegy

profile_positions.location: Living between London, Moscow and Saint Petersburg
profile_positions.description:
In this role, discovered the power of Strategic Alliances as I worked with small and medium-size System Integrators that I researched and reached out to from London, and met in Moscow and Saint Petersburg.

They had already the relationships with the decision-makers in big Russian corporations. They took us by the hand, translated our material to Russian, and presented it to our prospects.

They also explained to us the proper way to drink vodka shots: always with a small pickled cucumber afterward!

I never dreamed of visiting Russia 16 times, learning a bit of the language, and meeting amazing people from Electricity companies, both conventional power generation and Nuclear (I was even inside the headquarters of Rosenergoatom: the Operator for all nuclear power plants in Russia!).

By respecting people’s culture and bringing my passion for technology with the same enthusiasm that I brought to Mexico, the United States, or Malaysia, I was able to connect with the decision-makers of the companies in Russia and make in-roads.

Russians are one the most vibrant and life-loving people that I have ever met. I fell in love with the openness of people there. Don’t ask a Russian, How are you? unless you have 15 minutes to spare because they will really tell you what’s going on in their life in detail!

I discovered that the passion for your work, respect for cultures, creating long-term relationships, and connecting technology features to urgent business needs, are key fundamentals to do business in every part of the world.
profile_positions.title: Director Strategic Alliances

profile_positions.location: London, Edinburgh, KL, Houston, Trinidad: travelling to our clients's locations
profile_positions.description:
A true adventure around the world as I identified, connected with, and visited the key decision-makers in bp and Shell for their Digital Oilfield programs: potential customers for our new technology.

I traveled from London to Malaysia then to Houston and back to London in the same week (and I was doing an Executive MBA at the time!). I had definitely a lot of energy and I still do 17 years later. That's me!

I discovered that I have more energy when I am passionate about what I am doing, and when I am empowered and supported. 

That is why I could work around the world and do an MBA at the same time. 

My passion for people in different continents united by the same goals got me going. 
I think that there I fell in love with well-run companies, driven by a common purpose.

I also learned a lot (in hindsight) about aligning with the Perfect Customers inside a big corporation. 

Dealing with great multinationals like bp and Shell could be intimidating, but at the end of the day, when you connect with people that have the same values as you, and you align your technologies with their business needs, things are effortless and smooth.
profile_positions.title: Global Account Manag.- London, KL and Houston & studying an MBA: aligning with perfect customers

profile_positions.location: I lived in Houston and travelled all over the United States to see our clients.
profile_positions.description:
By the year 2000 Consultative Selling and Solutions Selling had become a real trend and I was fortunate to be trained by Hyprotech in these methodologies, even by the books' authors.

We had amazing group training courses: fun, interactive, and really useful for creating results in our work. 

This was , looking in hindsight, an inspiration for the Corporate and entrepreneurs Trainings that I do now, where I bring insights and breakthroughs to business people, working in groups, with Zoom or in person, so they can go out and contribute to the world with their Purpose (which I help clarify).

Using a Consultative Selling approach with the C-level of a multinational I was able to solve a conflict and renew a 5 years contract for 5 MM$ revenue value.

Creating partnerships with my clients at the time was very rewarding because they committed to the company long term, and that is what I teach my Coaching clients now, so they can move from transactional selling to consultative sellling and work with their Perfect Customers.
profile_positions.title: Consultative Selling: Building long-term Business Partnerships by achieving trust with the C-Level.

profile_positions.location: Former Baker Jardine. Working in Houston and travelling to Mexico and Venezuela.
profile_positions.description:
This was my first job and I discovered a great drive for results in me, a Passion for building relationships at the C-level, and a gift for connecting technology features with business needs.

I still use that today, especially with my Sustainability technology clients. Technology is great, but I always ask them to be aware of their clients' real business needs.

I moved from London to Houston, started an office there for my employer and another in Villahermosa, Mexico. I traveled all over Mexico, Venezuela, and the US. It was an adventure which I loved.

I won decisively in those markets by building relationships at both the engineers level and the C-level and sold close to a 3MM$ worth of Software and Services.

By bringing real Passion and enthusiasm for the products I was introducing and for the company's culture and people, I created a real "buzz" in the marketplace.

By respecting and even loving cultures and people and listening to their needs and goals, I was able to connect and create the desire by our customers to buy our products and remain in contact with us.

I was using Coaching, listening, and asking people questions in order to accelerate their personal and professional growth.

I learned a big deal about Employee Engagement from Alan Baker, the company’s owner.
He was a great mentor to me and made me feel empowered by asking me to start an office in Houston and another in Villahermosa, Mexico from scratch, and even lead people.

Alan Baker, the company's owner, created a company culture of fun, empowerment, and the joy of having friendly relationships with our customers, listening to them and being a true partner in business.

Those lessons have come with me in my career, and I dedicate myself now to be a true partner for my coaching clients, both entrepreneurs, and leaders in corporations.

I also teach my Coaching clients how to create really meaningful and lasting relationships with their clients so they become their biggest fans.
profile_positions.title: Discovering the meaning of Employee Engagement. Empowered to be an Intrapeneur. Selling 3 MM$.

volunteer_experiences.role: Facilitating several Webinars for educating members in Leadership topics
volunteer_experiences.description:
Volunteer for this 180,000 member association which mission is to disseminate technical information for the upstream oil and gas industry and help members to thrive in their work.
The SPE organizes events  all over the world to share "best practices" and I have provided Workshops in some of those events.
My participation in the SPE has been like follows:
1)  I am member of the Business Management & Leadership Committee. The members meet virtually and in events around the world to capture best practices in these areas that can help the members and their companies.
2) Workshop facilitator in issues of work passion, inspiring leadership and clients attraction. I presented in The Hague "Women in Energy" event (March 2016) and in the Annual Event in Dubai, in September 2016.
3) Provider of Webinars in English and Spanish on topics such as leadership, work passion and clients attraction.

volunteer_experiences.role: Volunteering a Workshop to help people in work transition from the Energy sector in Houston
volunteer_experiences.description:
I provided a workshop called "Finding your Unique Fuel for Action" to the Pay-it-Forward Network associates based in Houston, remotely from Madrid.	
This workshop was specially designed to assist people in a career transition, looking for a job, or perhaps starting a new freelance activity. 
The training helped attendees to get clear on the activities that energized them and they could do in a sustainable way. 
I reached that in a world where there is a wealth of information about strategies to find a job, the key is not actually the strategy, but the internal motivation to take consistent and congruent action. Furthermore, that internal motivation is associated with activities that are meaningful to us, and that inspire passion in us. 
I see passion not as a feeling, but as a commitment to take action in favor of what is meaningful for us. That commitment is preceded by the clarity on our work passions.
